titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to inflation adjust the $5,000 limitation with respect to dependent care assistance programs and flexible spending arrangements.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to inflation adjust the $5,000 limitation with respect to dependent care assistance programs and flexible spending arrangements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for an annual adjustment for inflation in taxable years beginning after 2015 to the $5,000 exclusion from the gross income of employees who receive employer-provided dependent care assistance.
